creationRules.name: üì• Inbox Note
creationRules.description: Creates a new note for quickly capturing thoughts that are not yet completely formed.
creationRules.template:
---
date: %YYYY%-%MM%-%DD%
tags: ['inbox']
---

# %name%

## Quick Capture


## Related Notes


## Follow-up Actions
- [ ] Process this note
- [ ] Add relevant links
- [ ] Move to appropriate location

creationRules.name: üìÜ Daily Note
creationRules.description: Creates or opens a timestamped note for the current day for journaling and quickly jotting down quick thoughts.
creationRules.template:
---
date: %YYYY%-%MM%-%DD%
type: daily-note
tags: ['daily-log']
---

# %WeekDay%, %Month% %Do%, %YYYY%

## Today's Focus


## Notes & Thoughts


## Tasks
- [ ] 

## Review
- What went well today?
- What could be improved?
- What did I learn?

creationRules.name: üìù Project Log
creationRules.description: Creates a new log entry for tracking progress on a DH project.
creationRules.template:
---
date: 
project: 
tags: ['project-log', %name%]
---
## Today's Progress:
* [ ] Task 1
* [ ] Task 2

## Challenges Encountered:

## Next Steps:
